name: This Way Up (GigaElk)
description:
Emma has died and received a mysterious letter about the afterlife. Now she must get to the doorway, and remember to bring the key.

As a ghost, she is able to easily walk through solid objects. However, the key is Iron and cannot.

A short game for the GameDev.tv GameJam 2022

  • Theme: Death Is Only The Beginning!
  • 10 Days
  • Only Free & Open Source Assets

This is a very simple puzzle game made in a short time using only free assets.

The Assets used are:

  • "GothicVania Town" by Ansimuz
  • "SunnyLand" by Ansimuz
  • "SunnyLand Forest" by Ansumuz
  • "TOOLKIT vol.2 Sound Pack Bundle" by  MAXMUD
  • "Ambient Music Pk" by TRWorkshop

...I drew the key myself.
